WRITING.TITLE: help a noob
WRITING.TEXT: ok so i have this old radio tape recorder, lW KW MK are working fine but FM needle just wont move so i have only one station. i know nothing about radios nor electronics *if its too complicated i rather leave it, but any way i wanna learn at least how to open it and close without screw it up * i live in Germany *it used to play 106 FM and now it plays 105,5... http://www.radiomuseum.org/r/philips_radio_recorder_automatic_1.html http://imgur.com/a/9OW3w

WRITING.TEXT:
ok so i have old radio tape recorder, lW KW MK are working fine but FM needle just wont move so i have only one station. i know nothing about radios nor electronics *if its too complicated i rather leave it but any way i wanna learn at least how to open it and close without screw it up ** i live in Germany
it used to play 106 FM and now it plays 105,5... http://www.radiomuseum.org/r/philips_radio_recorder_automatic_1.html
